goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 224 KB)
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office for Disaster Reduction (UNISDR)
title: Untitled
computation_calculations: 5 * Sum of age-specific fertility rates for each five-age group of woman between 15-49 year of life / 1000
computation_definitions: Total fertility rate represents the total number of live births per woman, that is, the sum of specific fertility rates.
comments_limitations: Total fertility rates per 1,000 inhabitants for the period 1996-2004 are calculated based on estimates of the present population, and for the period 2005-2022 they are calculated in relation to the estimated number of inhabitants based on the data of the 2013 Census.
